definition: tree trunk/main part of sth/to manage/to work/to do/capable/cadre/to kill (slang)/to fuck (vulgar)
to treat one another with absolute sincerity (idiom); to show total devotion
lit. liver and guts cut to pieces (idiom)/fig. grief-stricken

sentences.english: How to use fondaparinux in those patients?
sentences.chinese: 这些患者应该如何使用磺达肝癸钠？

sentences.english: The scientists took tissues from fetal liver, and lymph glands .
sentences.chinese: 科学家从胎儿肝和淋巴腺获得组织。

sentences.english: The protein expression of TLR2 in the liver was detected by immunohistochemistry.
sentences.chinese: 免疫组织化学观察肝组织TLR2蛋白的表达。

sentences.english: Objective:Research Qiwei safflower Shushen powder on the protective effect of liver injury.
sentences.chinese: 本论文研究七味红花殊胜散对肝损伤的保护作用。

sentences.english: Whether TTV is a hepatitis viral remains further study.
sentences.chinese: TTV是否嗜肝病毒，有待进一步研究。

sentences.english: Aim To investigate the liver damages caused by antituberculosis drugs.
sentences.chinese: 目的了解抗结核药物引起肺结核患者的肝损害。

sentences.english: Objective To explore the better surgical treatment method of complicated hepatic echinococcosis.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨复杂肝包虫病的较好手术方法。

sentences.english: The Liganshu granules have the preventive effect on immune liver injury in mice.
sentences.chinese: 利肝舒冲剂对小鼠免疫性肝损伤有预防作用。

sentences.english: This paper reports a new method of tryptophan clearance technique to measure hepatic blood flow non-invasively.
sentences.chinese: 报道用色氨酸清除技术检测犬肝血流量。

sentences.english: It's quite similar to alcohol-dependent hepatotoxicity.
sentences.chinese: 这是非常相似，酒精依赖的肝毒性。

sentences.english: Work on bioartificial liver devices has been under way for several years.
sentences.chinese: 生物人工肝装置的研究工作已经进行了好几年。

sentences.english: The shrimp hepatopancreas consists of a lot of epithelial tubules which are symmetrical.
sentences.chinese: 肝胰腺由两侧对称的分枝上皮小管组成。

sentences.english: Note the dark red congested regions that represent accumulation of RBC's in centrilobular regions.
sentences.chinese: 暗红色淤血区表示肝小叶中心区的红细胞积聚。

sentences.english: Chronic phase appearance of radiation hepatitis is similar to that of hepatocirrhosis.
sentences.chinese: 慢性期放射性肝损伤类似肝硬化之表现。

sentences.english: Objective To discuss the diagnosis value of ultrasonography in hepatorrhexis .
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨超声检查对肝破裂的诊断价值。

definition: five viscera of TCM, namely: heart 心[xin1], liver 肝[gan1], spleen 脾[pi2], lungs 肺[fei4] and kidneys 腎|肾[shen4]

(TCM) six bowels (hollow organs), namely: gall bladder 膽|胆[dan3], stomach 胃[wei4], large intestine 大腸|大肠[da4 chang2], small intestine 小腸|小肠[xiao3 chang2], triple heater 三焦[san1 jiao1], bladder 膀胱[pang2 guang1]
spleen and stomach (digestive organs in TCM)/preferences/one's taste (e.g. in literature)
(TCM) the three truncal cavities (thoracic, abdominal and pelvic), known as the "triple heater" or "San Jiao"
